import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./framework.css"; import "./master.css"; import photo from "./profile-user.png"; import change from "./cigarette.png"; import setting from "./settings.png"; import multipe from "./multiple-users-silhouette.png"; import friend from "./friends.png"; import team1 from "./team-01.png"; import team2 from "./team-02.png"; import team3 from "./team-03.png"; import team4 from "./team-04.png"; import team5 from "./team-05.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Input } from "react-select/animated"; export default function Challenge() { const [openPopupId, setOpenPopupId] = useState(null); // État pour suivre quel popup est ouvert const challenges = [ { id: 1, date: "15/10/2021", title: "Elzero Dashboard", description: "Elzero Dashboard Project Design And Programming And Hosting", team: [team1, team2, team3, team4, team5], progress: 50, action: "Learn New Language", }, { id: 2, date: "15/6/2022", title: "Academy Portal", description: "Academy Portal Project Design And Programming", team: [team1, team2, team3], progress: 80, action: "Go to Gym", }, ]; return (
